title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node.js and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, providing LLM, chat, and embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama, featuring markdown, code highlighting, and model management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API and reactive streams support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama, offering simple integration of local LLMs into Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompt templates and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into the editor as inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, enabling Ollama models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for using Ollama with Flask, FastAPI, Next.js, Tauri, etc.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to integrate Ollama models into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage options.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library for Ollama with GenServer-based client and LiveView hooks.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama, enabling on-device LLM chats in mobile/desktop apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to Ollama’s REST API with tokio support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete and summarization using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot server powered by Ollama, supporting group chats and custom system prompts.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of Modelfile recipes for creating custom Ollama models with fine-tuned weights.
